value:
Seeing those who stole everything
from me living...free of care or guilt.
I cannot forgive them!

The dead cannot wish for revenge,
much less seek it. That burden falls
on those left behind.

If you do not approve of what I have
become, then kill me. If you insist
that you cannot, then I will continue...

By my hand, Edelgard's head will
be removed from her shoulders...

Those before me were just beasts
with human faces. I had no choice
but to kill them, and so I did.$k$pThat...that is all there is to it.

So which are you? The kind who kills
or the kind who gets killed? I ask for
$Nf's sake...
Kill every last one of them!

I will tear your heads from
your shoulders...

I will not die... Not until I have
her head!

I will crush anyone who blocks
my path.

I am Dimitri Alexandre Blaiddyd.
No matter the world, even if I must
do it alone, I will keep killing...

...How many lives have you taken
in the name of peace?$k$pTo protect Askr, you add to another
growing mountain of corpses...$k$pTo dispel the regrets of the dead,
these hands have grown stained with
blood. They've taken many lives...$k$pPiling up corpses for justice...for the
dead... In the end, it's all murder. $k$pWe're the same, you and I. Monsters
who were born to kill... No surprise
then that we work well together.
はあっ
ぜえっ
がはっ
ぐあああっ
Out of my way!
I'll destroy you!
Don't struggle.
Begone!
Not before I...
Hmph.
I am Dimitri Alexandre Blaiddyd. Everything has been taken from me...
You would touch me? I do not seek the embrace of a friend...
Only hatred remains. If I could tear that woman to shreds right this very moment, I would.
Friends? A beast of your depravity, prattling on about friends? How amusing.
If you do not approve of what I have become, then kill me.
As soon as possible...I must kill her.
After all is said and done, we are both murderers. Both stained. Both monsters.
I'll handle this.
Do what you please.
They're mine.
